mapper.select:
SELECT visa_admin_info.email,first_name,middle_name,last_name, role_name
FROM visa_admin_info
INNER JOIN visa_login on visa_admin_info.email = visa_login.email
INNER JOIN role_master ON visa_login.role_id = role_master.role_id
WHERE visa_admin_info.delete_flag = 0;
SELECT email,role_name FROM visa_login INNER JOIN role_master ON visa_login.role_id = role_master.role_id
